main.page.intro: Completion of this form is mandatory for all passengers entering Haiti, these measures meet the standards for surveillance of diseases at risk for public health, according to the International Health Regulations (IHR) 2005
main.page.languages.title: Languages
form.label.travel-time: How long is your stay in Haiti?
label.required: All fields with an asterisk (*) are required
agree: I agree that my data and information, which I have entered in the form, may be used for the purpose of announcing arrival in the Republic of Haiti, as well as for sending information regarding health care measures, and in the event that an epidemiologist needs to be contacted.
pcr.test: Have you done the PCR test?
countrie.placeholder: Please select countries you have visited
travelNotice: Some fields will be enable only if mode of travel is
pdfNotice: By submitting the form, a pdf document will be generated so that you can print and bring it with you in Haiti
